requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or later / the latest version of SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 / Radeon RX 460 or similar
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Other Linux distributions should work too.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or later / the latest version of SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5~i7 Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 750Ti / AMD Radeon R9 270x or similar
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Other Linux distributions should work too.

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 / Radeon RX 460 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5~i7 Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 750Ti / AMD Radeon R9 270x or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
